item.title: “The Age of Privacy is Over” says Facebook’s CEO Mark Zuckerberg
item.description: Related articles by Zemanta {.zemanta-related-title} On a six-minute interview on stage with TechCrunch founder Michael Arrington Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg states that if he’d start facebook again all privacy settings by DEFAULT would be PUBLIC. A very interesting approach which leads to the question if people want if all of their data is available publicly?
